title: From Sept 1, power will be disconnected if bills are not paid: State-owned firm BESSCOM
description: The Bangalore Electricity Supply Company (BESCOM) announced that from September 1, electricity supply will be disconnected if bills or additional security deposits are not paid within 30 days. This action follows a recommendation from the Karnataka Electricity Regulatory Commission. Consumers are urged to pay their bills on time to avoid disconnection.
